name: THE ATTACK OF LIVING PUMPKINS
description:
In a zombie apocalypse...

Without any zombies... The pumpkins attack!!!...

Pumpkins have invaded the planet with thirsty... Brains?

The Attack Of The Living Pumpkins is an arcade shooter 2.5D.

Eliminate the pumpkins and compare the highest score. Player damage is in a random range.

Version 0.3.0:

  1. Random music.
  2. Random scenary.
  3. Random spawn pumpkins. 
  4. Random items (ammunition and ammunition)

5 visual effects:

  1. Classic          (retro videogame arcade)
  2. Neon             (Full neon colors)
  3. Green Boy (Gameboy visuals)
  4. Nestopia     (NES visuals)
  5. Ghost            (Inverted colors)
